title: SOLD: T210 Lipe portrait / batting pair SGC...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: T210 Lipe portrait / batting pair SGC...
posts.post_content:
For sale here is a pair of T210 Old Mill cards depicting Perry Lipe.  Lipe was a long time minor leaguer who is seen with this identical portrait image in the T206 set as part of the Richmond Colts.  In 1910, he was a member of the Macon Peaches of the South Atlantic League.

$SOLD net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S. via USPS. Tax free. :eek:

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
